name: BodyBuddies (alkanakisu)
description:
This is a platform puzzle game with classic game mechanism button-door, portal and more. However, the mechanism makes this game unique is death mechanism. You have a death limit in levels so you don't fail the level as you die. You should die to make dead bodies and use this bodies by pushing or grabbing. Your mission is to get the floppy disks and get your memory back. 

Source Code and Assets: https://github.com/AlkanAkisu/BodyBuddies
